data.actual_result: The top of the menu is cut off <:blobsad:280621860822188032>
data.expected_result: You should be able to see the whole Emoji picker menu and not have it cut off at the top.
data.short_description: While in a Video Call or Screenshare, when you start searching for an emoji the top of the list is cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a friend - Start a Screenshare or video call with said friend - Start typing an emoji name in chat (ex :bl) which would trigger a list of blobs if you are in the blob server. - Notice the top of that picker is cut off. - Profit?
